name: Dezgo
description: 🪄 Provides easy&fast access to text2image / image2image / inpainting AI. (57 models across Stable Diffusion 1.x/2.x and finetuned models)

api_methods.name: /text2image
api_methods.description:
Generate an image from a text description
The result is returned as "image/png".

The following parameters influence the request cost: `width`, `height`, `steps`, `upscale`
(see the "About" section for more details)

License: CreativeML Open RAIL-M (https://dezgo.com/license.txt)


**Global Constraints:**
- Auto resolution: if not provided, fields `width` and `height` are automatically set to the model's native resolution.

parameters.name: prompt
parameters.description:
Describe how the final image should look like

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: an astronaut riding a horse, digital art, epic lighting, highly-detailed masterpiece trending HQ

parameters.name: seed
parameters.description:
Unique image seed number. If not provided, the image will be random.
An unsigned 32-bit integer seed used to control the generator randomness.
Reusing the same seed with the same parameters will produce the same image.
Reusing the same seed with slightly different parameters tends to produce variations of the same composition ;
you can use this to experiment with the impact of different parameters.

If you instructed the API to choose a random seed, it can be retrieved from the response header `x-input-seed`

**Constraints:**
- Range: `0 - 4294967295`

parameters.name: guidance
parameters.description:
Adjusts how much the AI tries to fit the prompt (higher = stricter, lower = more freedom).
Higher values means that the AI will try harder to match the text, but extreme values may produce more artifacts.
Lower values means that the AI is allowed more creative freedom in the interpretation of the text.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `-20 - 20`

parameters.name: steps
parameters.description:
Number of sampling steps. More steps = more details but also longer computation time.
More steps may improve quality under some circumstances and refine details, but it will take longer and be more expensive.
Fewer will result in lower quality images but is quicker and cheaper to process.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `10 - 150`

parameters.name: sampler
parameters.description:
Defines the sampling method used to generate the image.
The best samplers for low step counts tend to be `dpm`, `euler` and `euler_a`.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `ddim`
  - `dpm`
  - `euler`
  - `euler_a`
  - `k_lms`
  - `pndm`

parameters.name: width
parameters.description:
The image width in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: upscale
parameters.description:
Upscale the image by this factor using the Real-ESRGAN model. Currently only a factor of 2 is supported.

**Constraints:**
- Range: `1 - 2`

parameters.name: negative_prompt
parameters.description:
Describe what you DON'T want in the generated image

**Constraints:**
- Text length: `0 - 1000` characters
parameters.default: ugly, tiling, poorly drawn hands, poorly drawn feet, poorly drawn face, out of frame, extra limbs, disfigured, deformed, body out of frame, blurry, bad anatomy, blurred, watermark, grainy, signature, cut off, draft

parameters.name: height
parameters.description:
The image height in pixels.
Must be divisible by 8 (auto-adjusted to the lowest multiple)

**Constraints:**
- Range: `320 - 1024`

parameters.name: model
parameters.description:
The AI used to generate the image.

**Constraints:**
- Enum:
  - `abyss_orange_mix_2`
  - `analog_diffusion`
  - `anything_3_0`
  - `anything_4_0`
  - `basil_mix`
  - `blood_orange_mix`
  - `deliberate`
  - `dh_classicanime`
  - `disco_diffusion_style`
  - `double_exposure_diffusion`
  - `dreamshaper`
  - `duchaiten_anime`
  - `duchaiten_darkside`
  - `duchaiten_dreamworld`
  - `eimis_anime_diffusion_1`
  - `ely_orange_mix`
  - `emoji_diffusion`
  - `epic_diffusion_1`
  - `epic_diffusion_1_1`
  - `foto_assisted_diffusion`
  - `future_diffusion`
  - `hasdx`
  - `iconsmi_appiconsmodelforsd`
  - `inkpunk_diffusion`
  - `lowpoly_world`
  - `openjourney`
  - `openjourney_2`
  - `openniji`
  - `paint_journey_2_768px`
  - `papercut`
  - `pastel_mix`
  - `portrait_plus`
  - `realistic_vision_1_3`
  - `redshift_diffusion`
  - `redshift_diffusion_768px`
  - `something_2`
  - `stable_diffusion_fluidart`
  - `stable_diffusion_papercut`
  - `stable_diffusion_voxelart`
  - `stablediffusion_1_4`
  - `stablediffusion_1_5`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_0_768px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_512px`
  - `stablediffusion_2_1_768px`
  - `steampunk_diffusion`
  - `synthwavepunk_v2`

  - `vox_2`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_3`
  - `waifudiffusion_1_4`

utterances.utterance: Create a highly detailed digital painting of a futuristic city skyline at sunset with flying cars and neon lights, using a resolution of 800 by 600 pixels.

parameters.prompt: futuristic city skyline at sunset with flying cars and neon lights, digital painting, highly detailed

utterances.utterance: Can you generate an image of a medieval knight in shining armor standing in a misty forest, with epic lighting and a moody atmosphere?

parameters.prompt: medieval knight in shining armor standing in a misty forest, epic lighting, moody atmosphere

utterances.utterance: Please produce a cartoon-style illustration of a happy golden retriever puppy playing with a red ball in a sunny park, and upscale it by a factor of 2.

parameters.prompt: cartoon-style illustration of a happy golden retriever puppy playing with a red ball in a sunny park

utterances.utterance: I want to see a surreal artwork of a giant octopus wrapped around a lighthouse during a stormy night, with dark clouds and lightning.

parameters.prompt: surreal artwork of a giant octopus wrapped around a lighthouse during a stormy night, dark clouds, lightning

utterances.utterance: Generate a portrait of a young woman with blue hair and futuristic cyberpunk makeup, using the 'waifudiffusion_1_4' model and 50 sampling steps for more detail.

parameters.prompt: portrait of a young woman with blue hair and futuristic cyberpunk makeup

utterances.utterance: Could you make an image of a vintage steam locomotive crossing a mountain bridge at dawn, with warm lighting and realistic textures?

parameters.prompt: vintage steam locomotive crossing a mountain bridge at dawn, warm lighting, realistic textures

utterances.utterance: Show me a fantasy scene of a dragon perched on a cliff overlooking a medieval castle, with dramatic clouds and sunset colors, but exclude any humans or knights.

parameters.prompt: fantasy scene of a dragon perched on a cliff overlooking a medieval castle, dramatic clouds, sunset colors

utterances.utterance: Make a pixel art style image of a spaceship landing on an alien planet with purple skies and strange plants, sized 512 by 512 pixels.

parameters.prompt: pixel art style image of a spaceship landing on an alien planet with purple skies and strange plants

utterances.utterance: Create a dreamy watercolor painting of cherry blossom trees in full bloom along a riverbank, with soft pastel colors and gentle lighting.

parameters.prompt: dreamy watercolor painting of cherry blossom trees in full bloom along a riverbank, soft pastel colors, gentle lighting

utterances.utterance: I want an image of a sleek black sports car racing through a neon-lit city street at night, using the 'synthwavepunk_v2' model and the 'dpm' sampler for a stylized effect.

parameters.prompt: sleek black sports car racing through a neon-lit city street at night
